resources.string: By continuing to create an account on Metospherus Comprehensive Medical System, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy as our client.
Your full legal name will never be shown to anyone with the exception for legal purposes , inconsideration to your health or for monitory payments made with you consent.

This helps protect your account from Hackers and some who has been granted access to your account from accessing some personal information without your permission, the action with your consent takes your fingerprint mapping and is used on your account encase you need to access or encryption to date to only you.
